snippet: Leather jackets worn with turtlenecks, white jeans paired with ankle boots — this season’s pieces recall the edgy bohemia of the East Village in the 1970s.
abstract: Spring season's leather designs, from jackets to boots, recall edgy bohemia of New York City's East Village in the 1970s.
lead_paragraph: Leather jackets worn with turtlenecks, white jeans paired with ankle boots — this season’s pieces recall the edgy bohemia of the East Village in the 1970s.
